title: 5.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
The sales targets achieved by the sales executives of a certain company for a quarter are listed below:

Create an Excel file with this data. Use the nested IF function to determine the grades of the sales executives based on the following conditions:

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
